name: airtable-printer
description: Airtable data printer with Pug and Stylus

scripts.build: npx pug src/templates/index.pug -o dist/ && npx stylus src/styles/main.styl -o dist/css/ && npx stylus src/styles/table-styles.styl -o dist/css/
scripts.watch: pug src/templates/*.pug -o dist/ -w & stylus src/styles/*.styl -o dist/css/ -w
